g.text: ##### object is the entity on which to check the conditions
##### condition is the symptom to evaluate
# volume usage should be less than 80%
##### action is the action to perform when condition is true
root@kubemaster# kubectl describe pvc px-postgres-pvc | grep Capacity
Normal MonitoringStarted Started monitoring volume pvc-82ced888-19f6-11e9-a9a4-080027ee1df7
Warning ConditonApproaching Volume pvc-82ced888-19f6-11e9-a9a4-080027ee1df7 has met condition:
Warning ConditonMet Volume pvc-82ced888-19f6-11e9-a9a4-080027ee1df7 has met condition:
Warning ActionTriggered Action: resize triggered for volume pvc-82ced888-19f6-11e9-a9a4-080
Normal ActionSuccessful Volume pvc-82ced888-19f6-11e9-a9a4-080027ee1df7 has been resized su
